bill.summary: 6/11/1987--Introduced. Authorizes 18 named individuals, or the legal representatives of their estates, to commence an action on a claim against the United States for injuries or death sustained by such individuals in a truck accident which occurred as a result of alleged negligence of employees of the United States and members of the Idaho National Guard during firefighting operations in August 1986.
